title: Попробуйте сами: 3 шага к собственной CRM

steps.title: Начать демо
steps.description: 3 шага — и у вас своя CRM
steps.alt: NocoBase interface displaying a sortable table of companies with columns for name, website, industry, employees, and attachments, highlighting data customization options in a no-code platform.

button.label: 3 шага — и у вас своя CRM

steps.title: Открыть менеджер коллекций
steps.description: Откройте менеджер коллекций
steps.alt: NocoBase admin panel with quick access to Roles, Permissions, Collections, System Settings, Workflow, and Plugin settings for efficient management and configuration.

button.label: Откройте менеджер коллекций

steps.title: Создать коллекции
steps.description: Давайте создадим коллекции «Компании» и «Заказы»
steps.alt: NocoBase collection manager interface with options for creating and managing database collections.

button.label: Давайте создадим коллекции «Компании» и «Заказы»

steps.title: Добавить поля
steps.description: Далее добавим несколько полей в коллекцию
steps.alt: NocoBase collection manager interface showing configurable fields for business data collections.

button.label: Далее добавим несколько полей в коллекцию

steps.title: Выбрать тип поля
steps.description: Нужны текст, дата, пользователь или статус? Просто выберите нужный тип из десятков доступных полей
steps.alt: NocoBase interface showing system fields configuration for company data management.

button.label: Нужны текст, дата, пользователь или статус? Просто выберите нужный тип из десятков доступных полей

steps.title: Завершить создание коллекции
steps.description: Complete, exit the collection manager page
steps.alt: Configuring fields for company data in NocoBase Collection Manager.

button.label: Complete, exit the collection manager page

steps.title: Войти в редактор интерфейса
steps.description: Back to the blank canvas, let's go into UI Editor mode
steps.alt: Empty user interface of NocoBase platform ready for customization.

button.label: Back to the blank canvas, let's go into UI Editor mode

steps.title: Добавить меню
steps.description: Now, the configure buttons appears on the interface. Let's add some menus
steps.alt: NocoBase customizable menu add options featuring Group, Page, and Link.

button.label: Now, the configure buttons appears on the interface. Let's add some menus

steps.title: Добавить подменю
steps.description: It is also possible to add unlimited levels of submenus
steps.alt: Configurable menu interface in NocoBase for streamlined management of customer data.

button.label: It is also possible to add unlimited levels of submenus

steps.title: Подготовка к добавлению блоков
steps.description: Now, it's time to add blocks within the page
steps.alt: NocoBase interactive customer management screen showcasing various customer categories and details options.

button.label: Now, it's time to add blocks within the page

steps.title: Добавить табличный блок
steps.description: We add a table block to display companies data
steps.alt: Configurable data blocks menu for streamlined operations in NocoBase customer management platform, showing options for adding diverse customer interaction details.

button.label: We add a table block to display companies data

steps.groupName: Lay out blocks within a page

steps.title: Настроить столбцы таблицы
steps.description: We can decide which fields to display
steps.alt: Configurable customer details panel in NocoBase showing editable fields and company information.

button.label: We can decide which fields to display

steps.title: Настроить действия
steps.description: We can also decide which actions to enable
steps.alt: Customizable customer management screen in NocoBase showing industry details and employee numbers.

button.label: We can also decide which actions to enable

steps.title: Настроить страницу с деталями
steps.description: Click 'View' and we go to configure the details page for each record
steps.alt: NocoBase customer management screen showing detailed view options and attachment features for diverse industries.

button.label: Click 'View' and we go to configure the details page for each record

steps.title: Добавить вкладки
steps.description: We can add some tabs
steps.alt: NocoBase platform demonstrating customer management interface with details panel and data block options.

button.label: We can add some tabs

steps.title: Добавить блок с деталями
steps.description: Rich blocks can be added in each tab. Let's add a details block
steps.alt: NocoBase UI showing customer management with detailed options to add blocks for enhanced functionality.

button.label: Rich blocks can be added in each tab. Let's add a details block

steps.title: Настроить макет
steps.description: Drag and drop combination fields to adjust the layout
steps.alt: Detailed customer profile interface in NocoBase showing industry-specific information and customizable fields.

button.label: Drag and drop combination fields to adjust the layout

steps.title: Переключить вкладку
steps.description: Go to the next tab and add a block of association data to make it easy to view this customer's orders
steps.alt: NocoBase user interface demonstrating how to add and customize blocks in a dynamic customer management system, showing dropdown menus for block additions.

button.label: Go to the next tab and add a block of association data to make it easy to view this customer's orders

steps.title: Продолжить настройку
steps.description: Continue
steps.alt: NocoBase interface showcasing a detailed customer management module with industry categorization and contact editing features.

button.label: Continue

steps.title: Добавить больше блоков
steps.description: We can add as many blocks as we want within a page
steps.alt: Screenshot of NocoBase's order creation interface showcasing data entry fields, configuration options, and a bar chart visualization.

button.label: We can add as many blocks as we want within a page

steps.title: Перетащить для настройки
steps.description: Drag and drop these blocks to adjust the layout
steps.alt: NocoBase new order interface with dynamic pricing and customer selection.

button.label: Drag and drop these blocks to adjust the layout

steps.title: Настроить элементы
steps.description: Each block and even each element can be configured
steps.alt: NocoBase platform showcasing dynamic configuration of order entries with customizable columns in an interactive dashboard layout.

button.label: Each block and even each element can be configured

steps.title: Выйти из редактора интерфейса
steps.description: Okay, let's exit UI Editor mode
steps.alt: NocoBase UI showcasing dynamic order management with automated calculations and industry-specific data visualization.

button.label: Okay, let's exit UI Editor mode

steps.title: Демо завершено
steps.description: Now, let's get started with NocoBase!
steps.alt: NocoBase no-code DEMO

button.label: Now, let's get started with NocoBase!
